post:
1. This is ChicagoVPS price, please don't expect RAMNode Support. Your support tickets will be answered within 24 hours. 

2. 100G HDD is RAID Protected, you can store your backup here without worrying

3. We do not oversell RAM and HDD. You can just put your files full of this vps.

4. Virtualization is KVM, you can install Windows if you want.

5. It does not have Dedicated IPv4. We provide noVNC console for you to mange your VPS.

6. Order Link: http://bit.do/lewissue1

7. _If you see it $3.25, please use coupon code CYBERMONDAY2K15 to get discount._

8. _If you afraid Lewissue to troll you, this time I'm not trolling._

9. PayPal fee is so fucky. If you pay with paypal gift to avoid fee, I will discount you.

10. Please don't ask me for discounting except situations of 9. I will not discount you even if you buy bi-annually.

11. The CPU of this VPS is roughly power of a Atom D2500 Dedicated Server.

12. It's Europe-located.
